value.name: Family of Soulemane to file wrongful death lawsuit against CT police, state
value.description: The family of Mubarak Soulemane, the 19-year-old man who was shot and killed by a state trooper in West Haven, is filing a major lawsuit.

value.name: Ebong Udoma
value.description: A state police officer shot Mubarak Soulemane at an I-95 exit ramp in West Haven in January. Police had chased him from Norwalk, after he was said to have stolen a car and was armed with a knife.
